    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AdminController
    Controller for administrative operations.
    AdminFlipFitMenu
    The Class AdminFlipFitMenu.
    AdminService
    Service class for Admin role functionality.
    App
    Main application class for the FlipFit Dropwizard REST API.
    AuthController
    Controller for authentication-related operations such as login and registration.
    Booking
    Represents a session booking made by a customer for a specific slot.
    BookingDAO
    Data Access Object interface for managing booking-related persistent data.
    BookingDAOImpl
    MySQL-based implementation of the BookingDAO interface.
    BookingNotDoneException
    The Class BookingNotDoneException.
    BookingNotification
    Specialized notification for confirming successful slot bookings.
    BookingService
    Service class for handling all booking-related operations.
    BookingServiceInterface
    Interface for Booking Service Operations.
    BookingStatus
    Enum representing the current life-cycle status of a gym slot booking.
    CustomerFlipFitMenu
    The Class CustomerFlipFitMenu.
    CustomerService
    Service class that orchestrates operations for Gym Customers.
    DBConnection
    The Class DBConnection.
    FlipFitApplication
    The Class FlipFitApplication.
    FlipFitConfiguration
    Configuration class for the FlipFit Dropwizard application.
    FlipFitMenuInterface
    Interface for FlipFit Menus
    GymAdmin
    Represents a system administrator in the FlipFit platform.
    GymAdminDAO
    Data Access Object interface for system administrative operations.
    GymAdminDAOImpl
    MySQL-based implementation of the GymAdminDAO interface.
    GymCenter
    Represents a gym center in the system.
    GymCustomer
    Represents a gym customer in the system.
    GymCustomerController
    Controller for customer-related operations.
    GymCustomerDAO
    Data Access Object interface for customer-specific database operations.
    GymCustomerDAOImpl
    MySQL-based implementation of the GymCustomerDAO interface.
    GymOwner
    Represents a gym owner in the FlipFit system.
    GymOwnerController
    Controller for gym owner operations.
    GymOwnerDAO
    Data Access Object interface for gym owner operations.
    GymOwnerDAOImpl
    MySQL-based implementation of the GymOwnerDAO interface.
    GymOwnerFlipFitMenu
    The Class GymOwnerFlipFitMenu.
    GymOwnerService
    The Class GymOwnerService.
    GymService
    Service class for managing gym centers.
    GymServiceInterface
    Interface for Gym Operations
    GymUserDAO
    Data Access Object interface for managing user-related persistent data.
    GymUserDAOImpl
    MySQL-based implementation of the GymUserDAO interface.
    GymUserInterface
    Interface for Gym User Operations
    GymUserService
    The Class GymUserService.
    HashGenerator
    Utility tool to generate SHA-256 hashes for passwords and generate SQL update statements.
    InvalidAadhaarException
    Exception thrown when a provided Aadhaar number is invalid or fails verification.
    InvalidEmailException
    Exception thrown when a provided email address is invalid or fails verification.
    InvalidMobileException
    Exception thrown when a provided mobile number is invalid or fails verification.
    IssueWithApprovalException
    The Class IssueWithApprovalException.
    Notification
    Represents a notification sent to a system user.
    PasswordUtils
    Utility class for password hashing using SHA-256.
    Payment
    Represents a payment transaction for a booked slot.
    PaymentDAO
    Data Access Object interface for managing payment transactions.
    PaymentDAOImpl
    MySQL-based implementation of the PaymentDAO interface.
    PaymentFlipFitMenu
    The Class PaymentFlipFitMenu.
    PaymentService
    The Class PaymentService.
    PaymentServiceInterface
    Interface for Payment Operations
    PaymentTest
    Test class for PaymentService verification.
    PromotionalNotification
    Specialized notification for promotional messages and offers.
    Registration
    Represents a user registration request in the FlipFit system.
    RegistrationNotDoneException
    The Class RegistrationNotDoneException.
    Role
    Represents a system role (e.g., Admin, Customer, Gym Owner).
    ServiceFactory
    Factory class to initialize and provide singleton service instances.
    Slot
    Represents a specific time slot available at a gym center.
    SlotDAO
    Data Access Object interface for managing gym slot data.
    SlotDAOImpl
    MySQL-based implementation of the SlotDAO interface.
    SlotNotAvailableException
    The Class SlotNotAvailableException.
    SlotService
    Service class for managing gym time slots.
    SQLConstants
    Centralized class for all SQL queries used in the application.
    User
    Base class representing a user in the FlipFit system.
    UserMenu
    The Class UserMenu.
    UserNotFoundException
    The Class UserNotFoundException.
    Waitlist
    The Class Waitlist.
    WaitlistDAO
    Data Access Object interface for managing waitlist-related persistent data.
    WaitlistDAOImpl
    MySQL-based implementation of the WaitlistDAO interface.
    WaitListNotification
    Specialized notification for waitlist-related updates.
    WaitlistService
    Service class for managing gym slot waitlists.
    WaitlistServiceInterface
    Interface for Waitlist Service Operations.
